paper_title.en: Search for charged Higgs bosons using the OPAL detector at LEP

description.en: A search is described to detect charged Higgs bosons via the process Z(0) --> H+H-, using data collected by the OPAL detector at LEP which correspond to an integrated luminosity of approximately 110 pb(-1). It is assumed that the Ht boson decays only to tau(+)nu(tau) and c (s) over bar final states. From the negative outcome of this search a lower bound of 44.1 GeV (95% CL) is derived for the mass of the charged Higgs boson.

paper_title.ja: Z<sup>0</sup>崩壊におけるbハドロンの平均寿命の測定(共著)
Z<sup>0</sup>のハドロン崩壊におけるB<sup>0</sup>-┣DAB<sup>0</sup>(/)-┫DA混合、Γ(Z<sup>0</sup>→bb┣D4-┫D4)/Γ(Z<sup>0</sup>→hadrons)、およびbフレイバーを持つハドロンのレプトンを含む崩壊分岐比の測定(共著)
5つのフレイバーに関する強い相互作用のフレイバー独立性のテスト(共著)
